metadata.title: CVE-2024-28825 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts on someauthentication methods in Checkmk before 2.3.0b5 (beta), 2.2.0p26,2.1.0p43, and in Checkmk 2.0.0 (EOL) facilitates password brute-forcing.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
